name: Avocode, Inc.
description: Developer of a file-sharing software designed to facilitate collaboration between designers and developers. The company's software exports images without preparing layers from Photoshop and Sketch designs, including colors, image assets, fonts, text, sizes, and dimensions, enabling customers to work on the web and mobile projects efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of a file-sharing software designed to facilitate collaboration between designers and developers. The company's software exports images without preparing layers from Photoshop and Sketch designs, including colors, image assets, fonts, text, sizes, and dimensions, enabling customers to work on the web and mobile projects efficiently.
